eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4DFokker-Planck-eq1}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}} P( \tau ) 
= 
{\hat E}_a \Big( 
{\hat E}_a + \displaystyle{\frac{1}{{\rm k}}}{\rm Tr}(t_a X {\rm e}^{-2V})
\Big) P( \tau ) 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4DFokker-Planck-eq2}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}} P( \tau ) 
= 
\displaystyle{\frac{1}{{\rm k}}}{\rm Tr} {\hat E} \Big( 
{\hat E} + ( {\hat E}S )
\Big) P( \tau )           \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:contact-term-eq2}
\Delta V^a 
& = & 
 \Big( ( \Delta g ) g^{-1} \Big) ^b L_b^{\ a} - \Delta \tau L_c^{\ b} L_c^{\ d} \Big( ( \partial_b \partial_d g ) g^{-1} \Big) ^e L_e^{\ a}          \ , \nonumber \\
& = &  
 \Big( - \Delta \tau {\hat E}S + \Delta w   \Big) ^b L_b^{\ a} - \Delta \tau L_c^{\ b} L_c^{\ d} \Big( ( \partial_b \partial_d g ) g^{-1} \Big) ^e L_e^{\ a}          \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
\label{eq:4DFokker-Planck-eq3}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}} P( \tau ) 
= 
\displaystyle{\frac{1}{\sqrt{G}}} \partial_a \Big( 
\sqrt{G}G^{ab} ( \partial_b + 
 \displaystyle{\frac{\delta S}{\delta V^b}} )
 P( \tau )  \Big)         \ ,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4Daction-component1}
S 
= 
\int\!\!\!d^4\!\! x \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} {\rm Tr}\big( 
- {1\over4} v_{mn}v^{mn} + {i\over 2} {\bar \psi}{\cal D}\!\!\!\! \slash \psi
\big)         \ .  
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4Dsupersymmetry-component}
\delta A_\mu
& = & 
i{\bar \epsilon}\gamma_m \psi \,  \nonumber \\
\delta \psi 
& = & 
-{1\over 2}v^{mn}\gamma_{mn}\epsilon  \, 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4Daction-component2}
S_E 
= 
\int\!\!\!d^4\!\! x \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} {\rm Tr}\big( 
{1\over4} v_{mn}^2 - {i\over 2} {\bar \psi}{\cal D}\!\!\!\! \slash \psi
\big)         \ .   
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4DLangevin-component}
{\Delta}v_m (\tau)
& = & 
-\Delta\tau \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} \big( 
{\cal D}_n v_{mn} - {\bar \psi}\gamma_m \psi 
\big) (\tau) + \Delta\xi_m (\tau)          \ , \nonumber \\
{\Delta}\psi (\tau)
& = & 
- \Delta\tau \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} {\cal D}\!\!\!\! \slash\ ^2 \psi (\tau) 
+ \Delta \chi ( \tau )          \ , \nonumber \\
\Delta \chi ( \tau )
& = & 
\Delta\xi (\tau) + i{\cal D}\!\!\!\! \slash \Delta\eta (\tau)  \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4Dnoise-component}  
<\Delta\xi^a_m(\tau,x) \Delta\xi^b_n(\tau,y)>  
& = & 
2\Delta\tau \delta^{ab}\delta_{mn}  \delta^4(x-y)     \ , \nonumber \\  
<\Delta\xi^a_\alpha(\tau,x) {\overline {\Delta\eta}}^b_\beta(\tau,y)>  
& = & 
- <{\overline {\Delta\eta}}^b_\beta(\tau,y) \Delta\xi^a_\alpha(\tau,x) >     
= 
\Delta\tau \delta^{ab} \delta^4(x-y)     .  
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:10Daction}
S 
= 
\int\!\!\!d^{10}\!\! x \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} {\rm Tr}\big( 
{1\over4} F_{\mu\nu}^2 -{i\over 2} {\bar \Psi}D\!\!\!\! \slash \Psi
\big)         \ ,   
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:10DLangevin}
{\Delta}A_\mu (\tau)
& = & 
-\Delta\tau \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} \big( 
D_\nu F_{\mu\nu} + {\bar \Psi}\Gamma_\mu \Psi 
\big) (\tau) + \Delta\xi_\mu(\tau)          \ , \nonumber \\
{\Delta}\Psi (\tau)
& = & 
- \Delta\tau \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} D\!\!\!\! \slash\ ^2 \Psi (\tau) 
+ \Delta\xi (\tau) + iD\!\!\!\! \slash \Delta\eta (\tau)          \  . 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:10Dnoise}  
<\Delta\xi^a_\mu(\tau,x) \Delta\xi^b_\nu(\tau,y)>  
& = & 
2\Delta\tau \delta^{ab}\delta_{\mu\nu}  \delta^{10}(x-y)     \ , \nonumber \\  
<\Delta\xi^a_\alpha(\tau,x) {\overline {\Delta\eta}}^b_\beta(\tau,y)>  
& = & 
- <{\overline {\Delta\eta}}^b_\beta(\tau,y) \Delta\xi^a_\alpha(\tau,x) >     \nonumber \\  
& = & 
\Delta\tau \delta^{ab}{1\over 2}(1+\Gamma_{11})_{\alpha\beta}  \delta^{10}(x-y)     \ .  
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:10DFokker-Planck-hamiltonian}
& {} & {\cal H}_{\rm HP}    \nonumber \\
& = & 
\int\!\!\! d^{10}x \Big\{ \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} \Big( 
 D_\nu F_{\mu\nu} + {\bar \Psi}\Gamma_\mu \Psi \Big)^a (x) - \displaystyle{\frac{\delta\quad }{\delta A^a_\mu(x)}} \Big\} \displaystyle{\frac{\delta\quad }{\delta A^a_\mu(x)}}             \nonumber \\
& + & 
\int\!\!\! d^{10}x \Big( 
{1\over 2}(1+\Gamma_{11})( -iD\!\!\!\! \slash \ ){\cal C}\ ^{-1} 
\Big) ^{ab}_{\alpha\beta}  \Big\{  \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} \Big( 
i {\cal C} D\!\!\!\! \slash\ \Psi (x) \Big) ^b_\beta  
- \displaystyle{\frac{\delta\quad }{\delta \Psi^b_\beta(x)}}  \Big\} \displaystyle{\frac{\delta\quad }{\delta \Psi^a_\alpha(x)}}                   .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:IIBsupersymmetry1}
\delta_1 A_\mu 
& = & 
i{\bar \epsilon}\Gamma_\mu \Psi \ ,  \nonumber \\
\delta_1 \Psi    
& = & 
{i\over 2}[ A_\mu, A_\nu ]\Gamma_{\mu\nu}\epsilon  \, \nonumber \\
\delta_2 A_\mu 
& = & 
0                     \ , \nonumber \\
\delta_2 \Psi 
& = & 
\lambda{\bf 1}        \ ,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:IIBLangevin}
{\Delta}A_\mu (\tau)
& = & 
-\Delta\tau \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} \Big( 
[ A_\nu, [ A_\nu, A_\mu ] ](\tau) + {\bar \Psi}\Gamma_\mu \Psi(\tau) 
\Big) + \Delta\xi_\mu(\tau)          \ , \nonumber \\
{\Delta}\Psi (\tau)
& = & 
\Delta\tau \displaystyle{\frac{1}{g^2}} \Gamma_\mu 
 [ A_\mu, \Gamma_\nu [A_\nu, \Psi ] ](\tau) 
+ \Delta\chi (\tau)           \ , \nonumber \\
\Delta\chi (\tau)  
& \equiv & 
\Delta\xi (\tau) + \Gamma_\mu[ A_\mu, \Delta\eta ](\tau)   \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:IIBnoise}  
<\Delta\xi_\mu(\tau)_{ij} \Delta\xi_\nu(\tau)_{kl}>  
& = & 
2\Delta\tau \delta_{il}\delta_{kj}\delta_{\mu\nu}      \ , \nonumber \\  
<\Delta\xi_\alpha(\tau)_{ij} {\overline {\Delta\eta}}_\beta(\tau)_{kl}>  
& = & 
- <{\overline {\Delta\eta}}_\beta(\tau)_{kl} \Delta\xi_\alpha(\tau)_{ij} >     
= 
\Delta\tau \delta_{il}\delta_{kj}{1\over 2}(1+\Gamma_{11})_{\alpha\beta}       .  
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4DFokker-Planck-eq1}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}} P( \tau ) 
= 
{\hat E}_a \Big( 
{\hat E}_a + \displaystyle{\frac{1}{{\rm k}}}{\rm Tr}(t_a X {\rm e}^{-2V})
\Big) P( \tau ) 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:4DFokker-Planck-eq2}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}} P( \tau ) 
= 
\displaystyle{\frac{1}{{\rm k}}}{\rm Tr} {\hat E} \Big( 
{\hat E} + ( {\hat E}S )
\Big) P( \tau )           \ .

\label{eq:contact-term-eq2}

& = &  
 \Big( - \Delta \tau {\hat E}S + \Delta w   \Big) ^b L_b^{\ a} - \Delta \tau L_c^{\ b} L_c^{\ d} \Big( ( \partial_b \partial_d g ) g^{-1} \Big) ^e L_e^{\ a}          \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
\label{eq:4DFokker-Planck-eq3}
\displaystyle{\frac{\partial}{\partial \tau}} P( \tau ) 
= 
\displaystyle{\frac{1}{\sqrt{G}}} \partial_a \Big( 
\sqrt{G}G^{ab} ( \partial_b + 
 \displaystyle{\frac{\delta S}{\delta V^b}} )
 P( \tau )  \Big)         \ ,

S
